data.name: declineError
data.value: An error was encountered while removing the iFolder.

data.name: deleteiFolder
data.value: This deletes the iFolder and its files from the server. Are you sure you sure you want to remove "{0}" form the server?

data.value: An error was encountered while reading iFolders

data.name: iFolderRevertError
data.value: An error was encountered while reverting the iFolder.

data.name: networkPath
data.value: The selected location is on a network or non-physical drive. iFolders must reside on a physical drive. Please select a different location and try again.

data.name: PathDoesNotExist
data.value: contain a folder with the same name as the iFolder.

data.name: pathExistsError
data.value: The loation you selected already contains a folder with the same name as this iFolder. Please select a different location and try again.

data.name: PathIncludesProgFilesDirError
data.value: The selected location includes the Program Files folder. The Program Files folder cannot contain an iFolder. Please select a different location and try again.

data.name: pathIncludesWinDirError
data.value: The selected location includes the Windows folder. The Windows folder cannot contain an iFolder. Please select a different lcoation and try again.

data.name: pathIniFolderError
data.value: The selected location is inside another iFolder. iFolders connot exist inside other iFolders. Please select a different location and try again.

data.name: pathInStoreError
data.value: The selected location is inside the iFolder data folder. Please select a different location and try again.

data.name: cannotShareMessage
data.value: It is not possible to share an encrypted iFolder. Only regular folders can be shared

data.name: exitMessage
data.value: If you exit the Novell iFolder application, changes in your iFolder will no longer be tracked. The next ime you login, Novell iFolder will reconcile any differences between your iFolder and Server

data.name: FolderDoesNotExistError
data.value: Then name of folder and iFolder must be the same

data.name: FolderDoesNotExistErrorDesc
data.value: You can merge an iFolder only with a folder with same name. Select a folder with same name as the iFolder and try again

data.value: This removes membership from iFolder and removes the iFolder from the list

data.value: Select the account for which the passphrase needs to be reset.

data.name: emailPageFirst
data.value: The encrypted key file was successfully exported.

data.name: emailPageSecond
data.value: Send this file to the administrator who will decrypt the key file and send it back to you. You can then use the decrypted key file to reset your passphrase using the second option of the wizard.

data.name: exitMessage1
data.value: If you exit the Novell iFolder application, changes in your iFolder will no longer be tracked. The next ime you login, Novell iFolder will reconcile any differences between your iFolder and Server

data.name: exportPageFirst
data.value: Gets the encrypted key file from the server and stores it locally.

data.name: finalPageFirst
data.value: Congratulations!! You have successfully reset the passphrase.Now,you can use the new passphrase to access your data.

data.value: Then name of folder and iFolder must be the same

data.value: The Passphrase is reset using the Decrypted key file.

data.name: infoPageFirst
data.value: To recover a lost passphrase, you need the secret file (private key of the certificate) and the password to it or the data file from the administrator.

data.name: infoPageSecond
data.value: If you don't have these parameters, you can use this wizard to export the old data file, which you can mail to your administrator who will decrypt and send it back to you. You can then use this new data file to reset your passphrase.

data.name: infoPageTitle
data.value: Welcome to the Passphrase Recovery Wizard
